metadata.title: CVE-2020-9283 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: golang.org/x/crypto before v0.0.0-20200220183623-bac4c82f6975 for Go allowsa panic during signature verification in the golang.org/x/crypto/sshpackage. A client can attack an SSH server that accepts public keys. Also,a server can attack any SSH client.

criterions.comment: snapd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
